scripts.copy: npm run clean &&  mkdir dist && cp client/index.css dist/
scripts.compile: npm run copy && browserify client/index.js -o dist/index.js -t babelify -t sheetify/transform -p [ css-extract -o dist/index.css ]
scripts.start: npm run copy && budo client/index.js --serve=dist/index.js --dir=client/ --open -- -t babelify -t sheetify/transform -p [ css-extract -o dist/index.css ]
